description:
Sawanaga Taisuke is a student in year one of class three.
A spirited, peculiar and rather hopeless romantic, Taisuke is a close friend of http://anidb.net/ch2344 [Makoto] from junior high school who frequently endeavors to forward his otherwise lonely ambitious love life; oblivious to the attraction of http://anidb.net/ch2348 [Hikari].
He takes a strong interest in http://anidb.net/ch2345 [Kotonoha], despite her rejection.
name: Sawanaga Taisuke
